answers.answer: Hello,this sounds like a very serious problem, one for the medical experts, but not one we can answer online.  The problem may not be related to diabetes, or perhaps only indirectly related.I can only ask if her blood sugars are well controlled?  How is her Hba1c?  If here blood sugars are not so well controlled, then this may predispose her to secondary infections and health complications.How is she doing now?

question: I have a young lady of 18 living with me she has type 1 diabetes end of December she was put in the hospital because her right eye swelled shut and the lining of the brain was also swollen, my question is has anyone had this happen with type 1 diabetes no dr can figure out what it is
title: swollen eye
